channel.title: Weird server problem... anyone?
channel.description:
this has always happend but i have ignored until now...
Sometimes one of the players on my server will get lagged out and try to log back in and they cant... so they will try to "mass login" and it cashes me...
Is there a way to fix this? Thanks in Advanced!

item.title: Weird server problem... anyone?
item.dc:creator: @Keasho Keasho
item.description:
@Keasho wrote:

k, well i dont know if will stop them
considering that they just close it
most of the time…
but i wonder if there is an acual way
to fix it?

Read full topic

item.title: Weird server problem... anyone?
item.dc:creator: @Onono6 Onono6
item.description:
@Onono6 wrote:

hm just make ur welcome screen say “dont mass log in or ban instantly” or something like hope this helped out

Read full topic
